name: Alive Cursor
description:
Still using the default cursor? meh! How about...turn your cursor into 3D?

  • Fancy effect！
  • Change any size you want！
  • Invisible when you don't need it! It's convenient when you are watching video or viewing the webpage!
  • Wander when it's bored！

*More crazy themes are coming up!
*Support workshop in the future, so you can use the wonderful cursor made by Creative Master around the world!
